text: Arnošt Pazdera (16 September 1929 - 27 October 2021) was a Czech footballer. He played in 19 games for the Czechoslovakia national football team from 1952 to 1958. Pazdera died on 27 October 2021, aged 92. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Czech footballers
title: Arnošt Pazdera
